description: User requests bedroom blinds to open gradually at sunrise with a gentle wake‑up light; assistant fetches sunrise time, then schedules blinds and light actions using device_control calls.

messages.content: You are SmartHome Orchestrator, an agentic LLM that manages IoT devices, weather data, energy prices and user routines. Use the provided tools to gather information and issue commands, always confirming actions with the user.
I’d like my bedroom blinds to open gradually at sunrise, and have a soft wake‑up light sequence start at the same time.
Sure! I’ll check today’s sunrise time for your home address and then schedule the blinds and lights to run at that moment. One moment while I gather the needed information.

Great, sunrise tomorrow will be at 6:45 AM. I’ll now schedule the blinds to open gradually over 15 minutes starting at sunrise, and I’ll turn on the bedroom light a minute later with a warm, low‑brightness setting.
Blinds schedule created: open to 100% gradually over 15 min starting at 2025-12-08T06:45:00-05:00.
Light schedule created: turn on at 2025-12-08T06:46:00-05:00 with brightness 30% warm.

All set! Tomorrow at sunrise (6:45 AM) your bedroom blinds will open slowly over 15 minutes, and a gentle warm light will turn on at 6:46 AM to help you wake up. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments.
